backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling access control, user profiles, equipment tracking, assignments, issues, sessions, activity logs, and blob storage operations with role‑based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for diagnostics, force refresh, and conditional service‑worker behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including components, hooks, screens, styles, manifest, and service worker.
frontend/docs/ANDROID_APK_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to generate an Android APK from the PWA using PWABuilder with prerequisites and step‑by‑step instructions.
frontend/docs/APK_BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Detailed instructions for building a TWA Android APK for Ramp Track using PWABuilder or Bubblewrap, including prerequisites and testing steps.
frontend/docs/APK_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Guide outlining the full workflow for generating and distributing the Android APK, focusing on PWABuilder deployment.
frontend/docs/APK_DOWNLOAD_LINK.md: Instructions for hosting and distributing the generated APK, recommending GitHub Releases for download links.
frontend/docs/APK_QUICK_START.md: Quick‑start guide for generating an Android APK in minutes using PWABuilder after deploying the PWA.
frontend/docs/INCIDENT_REPORT.md: Incident report detailing credit overuse, deployment issues, scanner flicker problems, and requested support actions between versions 61–100.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the app root and registers an auto-updating service worker with reload logic.
frontend/index.ts: Extracts image data from a canvas and decodes it using a referenced reader.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, shortcuts, and share targets for Ramp Track.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, lifecycle control, and network-first navigation with versioned caches.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication state, view routing via hash, and reconnection overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/AuthDiagnosticsP: UI panel displaying build info, network status, and service worker state for diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/DemoLoginHandler: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/EquipmentQRScann: QR scanner component managing camera setup, scanning flow, overlays, and torch control for login or equipment modes.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React class error boundary that catches rendering errors, logs them, and displays a recovery UI with reload, cache clear, and diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen handling username/password and badge scanning with validation, error display, and integration with AuthContext.
frontend/src/components/NotFound.tsx: Simple 404 page showing a not‑found message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows a small banner when the browser is offline using online/offline events.
frontend/src/components/PWAUpdateNotific: Empty placeholder file for a future PWA update notification component.
frontend/src/components/ReconnectingOver: Overlay showing a spinner during session reconnection with delayed dismiss capability and fade animations.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionScr: Screen allowing a signed‑in user to choose between agent or admin roles with user display info from AuthContext.
frontend/src/components/SignOnScreen.tsx: Sign‑on role selection screen that shows agent/admin login options based on the current user’s roles.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full‑screen splash image with a loading spinner used during initial app load.
frontend/src/config/appBuild.ts: Exports the app build version string and build date constants.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: React context managing auth state, session hydration, login, logout, and session refresh using localStorage.
frontend/src/data/gates.ts: Exports a static readonly list of gate coordinate objects with lat/lon and radius values.
frontend/src/data/userRoster.ts: Contains the full static user roster with credentials and roles for validating logins and badge scans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a Dfinity backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing identities, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for equipment, assignments, and issues using the backend actor with session validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables with touch‑optimized styles.
frontend/src/lib/apiClient.ts: Provides an authenticated API request helper with token handling, refresh state tracking, and structured error returns.
frontend/src/lib/auditLog.ts: Implements localStorage‑backed audit logging for scan events with user resolution, filtering, and log trimming.
frontend/src/lib/autoGateLocator.ts: Calculates nearest gate using Haversine distance against predefined coordinates and returns gate labels within 120m.
frontend/src/lib/clearCachedApp.ts: Clears service workers, caches, and storage before reloading the app after user confirmation.
frontend/src/lib/ensureUserContext.ts: Retrieves user context from localStorage with fallback logic and validates session state without clearing auth on errors.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentHistory.ts: Maintains in-memory equipment event history with logging, querying, and reset utilities.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentRegistry.ts: Manages a localStorage‑backed equipment registry with ID normalization, initialization of required equipment, and CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/lib/parseBadge.ts: Extracts the longest digit sequence from scanner input as a badge ID, returning null if fewer than four digits.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap file that initializes React with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing equipment, assignments, logs, filters, and audit events with periodic local registry updates.
frontend/src/pages/CheckInScreen.tsx: Handles equipment check‑in via scanning, validation, GPS capture, and assignment/equipment updates.
frontend/src/pages/CheckOutScreen.tsx: Handles equipment check‑out with scanning, availability validation, GPS capture, and backend logging.
frontend/src/pages/DEBUG_SAFE.tsx: Simple debug page confirming successful root boot.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentDetailScreen: Displays equipment details and history with status badges and not‑found handling.
frontend/src/pages/ManageEquipmentScreen: UI for viewing, searching, adding, and editing equipment using local registry and session validation.
frontend/src/pages/OperatorHomeScreen.ts: Home menu for operators with actions for taking, returning, and reporting issues on equipment.
frontend/src/pages/ReportIssueScreen.tsx: Workflow for scanning equipment, entering issue details, capturing photos, and submitting issue reports.
frontend/src/pages/SignInScreen.tsx: Login screen that sets auth state and triggers routing for operator or admin modes.
frontend/src/types/zxing.d.ts: Type definitions for ZXing browser QR/Barcode reader APIs loaded via CDN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theme extensions for colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing issues, existing features, and a pending auth-related feature request.
unknown.bash: Build script that changes to the frontend directory and runs pnpm build.
unknown.txt: Instructions for hosting, installing, using, and troubleshooting an Android APK for the Ramp Track app.
